extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.geohash.GeohashRecord
extension.description: A record-based processor that encodes and decodes Geohashes from and to latitude/longitude coordinates.

property.name: mode
property.description: Specifies whether to encode latitude/longitude to geohash or decode geohash to latitude/longitude

property.name: record-reader
property.description: Specifies the record reader service to use for reading incoming data

property.name: record-writer
property.description: Specifies the record writer service to use for writing data

property.name: routing-strategy
property.description: Specifies how to route flowfiles after encoding or decoding being performed. SKIP will enrich those records that can be enriched and skip the rest. The SKIP strategy will route a flowfile to failure only if unable to parse the data. Otherwise, it will route the enriched flowfile to success, and the original input to original. SPLIT will separate the records that have been enriched from those that have not and send them to matched, while unenriched records will be sent to unmatched; the original input flowfile will be sent to original. The SPLIT strategy will route a flowfile to failure only if unable to parse the data. REQUIRE will route a flowfile to success only if all of its records are enriched, and the original input will be sent to original. The REQUIRE strategy will route the original input flowfile to failure if any of its records cannot be enriched or unable to be parsed

property.name: latitude-record-path
property.description: In the ENCODE mode, this property specifies the record path to retrieve the latitude values. Latitude values should be in the range of [-90, 90]; invalid values will be logged at warn level. In the DECODE mode, this property specifies the record path to put the latitude value

property.name: longitude-record-path
property.description: In the ENCODE mode, this property specifies the record path to retrieve the longitude values; Longitude values should be in the range of [-180, 180]; invalid values will be logged at warn level. In the DECODE mode, this property specifies the record path to put the longitude value

property.name: geohash-record-path
property.description: In the ENCODE mode, this property specifies the record path to put the geohash value; in the DECODE mode, this property specifies the record path to retrieve the geohash value

property.name: geohash-format
property.description: In the ENCODE mode, this property specifies the desired format for encoding geohash; in the DECODE mode, this property specifies the format of geohash provided

property.name: geohash-level
property.description: The integer precision level(1-12) desired for encoding geohash

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: Flowfiles that are successfully encoded or decoded will be routed to success

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: Flowfiles that cannot be encoded or decoded will be routed to failure

relationship.name: original
relationship.description: The original input flowfile will be sent to this relationship

writesAttribute.name: mime.type
writesAttribute.description: The MIME type indicated by the record writer

writesAttribute.name: record.count
writesAttribute.description: The number of records in the resulting flow file
